Directory.description: Defines the input and output directories and filenames for the slicing and printing process.

input_directory.description: Base directory for input STL files

input_name.description: Name of the input STL file (without extension)

output_directory.description: Base directory for storing output files

output_name.description: Name of the output folder and files

Printer.description: Settings specific to the 3D printer, including dimensions and tool orientation.

printer_bed_size_x.description: Size of the printer bed along the X-axis in mm

printer_bed_size_y.description: Size of the printer bed along the Y-axis in mm

printer_bed_size_z.description: Size of the printer bed along the Z-axis in mm

printer_tool_orientation.description: Orientation of the tool head in degrees

Slicer.description: Settings for the slicing software, including the slicer type and configuration.

slicer_cmd_path.description: Path to the slicer's executable file

slicer_config_file_path.description: Path to the slicer configuration file

slicer_arguments.description: Additional arguments for slicing. These overwrite the values in the printer setup data

Rhino.description: Settings for Rhino file generation and visualization. Available line types: Continuous, Dashed, DashDot, Dotted.

rhino_support_color.description: Color for support structures in hex format

rhino_geometry_color.description: Color for geometry in hex format

rhino_additional_layer_color.description: Color for additional layers in hex format
